fragments.text:
Horses
            are
            beautiful
            animals
            with
            strong
            muscles.
          
          
            A
            horse
            can
            easily
            carry
            a
            person
            on
            its
            back.

Horses
            are
            beautiful
            animals
            with
            strong
            muscles.
          
          
            A
            horse
            can
            easily
            carry
            a
            person
            on
            its
            back.

A
              horse’s
              powerful
              legs
              help
              the
              animal
              run
              far
              and
              jump
              high.
            
            
              Some
              horses
              can
              run
              more
              than
              50
              miles
              per
              hour!

A
              horse’s
              powerful
              legs
              help
              the
              animal
              run
              far
              and
              jump
              high.
            
            
              Some
              horses
              can
              run
              more
              than
              50
              miles
              per
              hour!

Horses
            are
            fast,
            too.
          
          
            They
            are
            one
            of
            the
            fastest
            animals
            in
            the
            world.
          
          
            People
            like
            to
            watch
            horse
            races
            and
            guess
            which
            horse
            will
            run
            the
            fastest.
